pages.text:
Arnold Palmer won 92 tournaments, including 7 majors. His love of the game and go-getter attitude were legendary characteristics among golf fans who followed his career. Arnold Palmer Golf Management likes to reflect his exceptional performance record, his magnetic personality and unfailing sense of kindness. This ensures that visitors will be able to tell the difference between average golf experiences from an Arnold Palmer Golf Management experience. It’s the small things that make the difference, and Arnold Palmer Golf Management takes care of the small things with a smile. The Arnold Palmer and
Walt Disney World
®
Golf brands may have more in common than you think. It is a perfect fit that Arnold Palmer Golf Management operates
Walt Disney World
®
Golf courses! Both warmly welcome others with kindness and spark interest with their energy and story. They each know how to add a magical touch to anything from a half and half drink to golf. Finesse and consideration of the visitor in every small thing is what makes this place special.
Walt Disney World
®
Golf courses are managed with the true values of Arnold Palmer: pride, consideration, and honor.
Arnold Palmer Golf Management operates
Walt Disney World
®
Golf courses in the true spirit of Arnold Palmer – with pride, consideration and honor. Our team works diligently to create great club and golf experiences for every member, and every guest, every day.
Course Conditions, Service Standards, Pace of Play, Player Development, and Programming each play an important part in creating a great golf experience. We believe these elements are vital to our members’ and guests’ enjoyment of the game and their club. We operate a variety of clubs across the United States and each has a unique look and feel, however, all the clubs are consistent in that each strives for perfection as they endeavor to create a memorable and exceptional experience for our members and guests.
Learn More About Arnold Palmer Golf Management

Learn More About Arnold Palmer Golf Management

Make Your Next Event Truly Magical
The staff of PGA professionals at
Walt Disney World
®
Golf are eager to make your next golf tournament or outing one to truly remember. With three championship golf courses, we can host everything from you and 15 of your pals, to corporate team builders, to multi-course championships. The magic of Disney provides the perfect backdrop to your golf tournament, from beautiful scenery to challenging twists and turns on the course.
We provide a wide range of tournament services, and our dedicated Coordinators of
Walt Disney World
®
Golf Tournaments will help guide you in your pre-event planning as well as on the day of your event. Whether you’re in town or coming from across the globe, your golf outing will be perfectly accompanied by the many resorts, restaurants, and attractions that
Walt Disney World
®
has to offer.
In addition to reserving your next golf outing, our high experienced sales team can assist with securing lodging and transportation. We look forward to learning more about your event and sharing ideas on how we can make your next outing even more memorable.
View The Event Catalog
View The Merchandise Catalog
FootGolf Events
Walt Disney World
®
Golf operated by Arnold Palmer Golf Management is proud to offer the game of FootGolf to our guests at
Disney’s Oak Trail
Golf Course. When played in groups of four, 9 holes of FootGolf should take approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes, much like that of 9 holes of traditional golf.
Disney’s Oak Trail
FootGolf Course measures in at 1,240 yards over a par for the course of 35 with a challenging selection of par 3’s, 4’s and 5’s. There are no forced carries over any waterways on any of the 9 holes, therefore, young or old, it is fun for the whole family!
Looking for the perfect location to host your next Birthday Party, Family Reunion, Charity Fundraiser, Team-building activity, or Wedding Party celebration?...then think about trying something new, FootGolf! Fun, and affordable, and something that very few people will have experienced before, yet most everyone is capable of participating!
For more information about our group and tournament services, please contact Alex Forsyth, Director of Sales & Marketing, by calling (407) 454-5000, or by email at
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
. You may also fill out our inquiry form adjacent.
Click Here For The FootGolf Flyer

Walt Disney World
®
Golf, but we realize that you probably don't want to show off. By completing the short inquiry form below,
Walt Disney World
®
Golf will be able to follow-up within one business day. Making your day more magical is our priority, and great customer service is just one way to show you this.
